attributes.action: make the BBC relinquish the TV licence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the recent developments regarding the BBC and the fraudulent activity regarding their phone in lines we the undersigned want the BBC to stop charging people for TV licenses, the reason being that they cannot locate all the people that have used these phone lines of the BBC in good faith. Therefore The BBC will not be able to reimburse the public fully; as a result they should forgo their right to charge for a TV license.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
